attributes.action: Instigate a National 'End of Life Wishes' Day via NHS, Councils, Schools, Homes
attributes.additional_details: Discussions surrounding End of Life wishes can be difficult, but, it may be made easier if you knew that someone in your street, was having a similar 'open & honest' conversation with their families.  Accessible    literature & forums may help to understand language like 'Power of Attorney' or the term 'DNACPR' (Do Not Attempt Cardio Pulmonary Resuscitation) etc
attributes.background: Family members should be given an opportunity to discuss & express their wishes re Resuscitation, End of Life Pathways, Palliative Care at Home or Hospice etc.  Family discussions involving the whole family.  Ensuring the management & personal needs of illness approaching death are respectfully met.
